rows.label: tlk70000030_03_msg0002
rows.name:
It makes me feel as if there's
finally a chance to push
back against the Grail!

rows.label: tlk70000030_03_msg0003
rows.name:
Ha. But there's not
much chance for me...

rows.label: tlk70000030_03_msg0004
rows.name:
How do you do it? How do you
keep your heads up even in the
most hopeless situation?

rows.label: tlk70000030_03_msg0005
rows.name:
How can I keep going when my
beloved city is under attack and
we may all have to abandon it?
